card.name: Kikirikami Panzer
card.text: ■ Triple Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all creatures that have power 12000 or more from among them into your hand, then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. ■ When this creature would be discarded by one of your opponent's spell effect or creature ability, you may put it into the battle zone instead.
